Package videopoker.exceptions

package videopoker.exceptions
Provides the classes for handling exceptions.

This package contains the classes implemented to handle the advise table, the card holding analysis as well as the payout values.

It also contains the Stats class, which is used to represent the statistics of a the runned deals.

See Also:
  • IllegalAmountException
  • IllegalCommandException
  • InvalidPlayer
  • InvalidSimulationMode
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    videopoker
    Provides the base game classes for the application.
    videopoker.commands
    Provides the classes necesary for the handle of the commands of the Debug mode.
    videopoker.deck
    Provides the classes related to game cards.
    videopoker.helpers
    Provides the classes related to game hand analysis and payout.
  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    IllegalAmountException
    Exception class throwned when the amount of money is not valid.
    IllegalCommandException
    Exception class throwned when an illegal command is given to the game.
    InvalidPlayer
    Exception class throwned when player object creation fails.
    InvalidSimulationMode
    Exception class throwned when the parameters of the simulation mode are invalid.
